word: "Whoso eateth My flesh, and drinketh My blood," Christ said, "hath eternal life." "As the living Father hath sent Me, and I live by the Father: so he that eateth Me, even he shall live by Me." "It is the spirit that quickeneth; . . . the words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life." [John 6:54, 57, 63.]
